feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.58.3: Fix URL param provided passphrases
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Retrieve URL with passphrase parameter (#3506) @ozovalihasan

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@ozovalihasan and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.58.3

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.58.4: API new fields; Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Add fields to API responses of active and expired pushes (#3512) @ozovalihasan

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump rubocop-ast from 1.45.1 to 1.46.0 (#3536) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1128.0 to 1.1129.0 (#3535) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump io-console from 0.8.0 to 0.8.1 (#3534) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.192.0 to 1.193.0 (#3532) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump erb from 5.0.1 to 5.0.2 (#3531) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump solid_queue from 1.1.5 to 1.2.0 (#3527) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump config from 5.5.2 to 5.6.1 (#3526) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump mission_control-jobs from 1.0.2 to 1.1.0 (#3525) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump multi_json from 1.15.0 to 1.16.0 (#3522) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1125.0 to 1.1126.0 (#3521) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump tilt from 2.6.0 to 2.6.1 (#3519) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump sqlite3 from 2.7.1 to 2.7.2 (#3515) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump google-apis-storage_v1 from 0.53.0 to 0.54.0 (#3516) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump rdoc from 6.14.1 to 6.14.2 (#3514) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1124.0 to 1.1125.0 (#3513) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.191.0 to 1.192.0 (#3510) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.59.0: New Automatic TLS 🥳🥳🥳
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This release updates the Docker container with automatic TLS (SSL) certificate management. No more need for Nginx, Apache or other TLS termination points. Here's how to get a Password Pusher instance with automatic TLS:

→ Setup a DNS record to point to your server (e.g. pwpush.example.com) and run:

docker run -d -p "80:80" -p "443:433" --env TLS_DOMAIN=pwpush.example.com pglombardo/pwpush:latest

and browse to https://pwpush.example.com.

Note: The previous default HTTP port 5100 still works as always too.

:rocket: Features

  • Add automatic TLS certificates (#3501) @ozovalihasan

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.193.0 to 1.194.0 (#3555) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump importmap-rails from 2.1.0 to 2.2.0 (#3554) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump reline from 0.6.1 to 0.6.2 (#3553) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-kms from 1.106.0 to 1.107.0 (#3552) @dependabot[bot]
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-partitions from 1.1131.0 to 1.1133.0 (#3551) @dependabot[bot]

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot[bot], @ozovalihasan, @pglombardo and dependabot[bot]

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

→ Setup a DNS record to point to your server (e.g. pwpush.example.com) and run:

sh docker run -d -p "80:80" -p "443:433" --env TLS_DOMAIN=pwpush.example.com pglombardo/pwpush:1.59.0`

and browse to https://pwpush.example.com.

or alternatively

→ Use one of our production ready Docker Compose files with persistent databases.
